name: Happy Hour Hop
description: Working as a doorman for two years I was  frequently approached by visitors and tourist desperately in search of local spots off their typical itinerary.  I felt the need to create an experience where  people could explore the city, as I do.  This city  offers an amazing local scene, from happy hours to unique bar scene and our own  Philadelphia proud dive bars  from Center City to South Philly and Northern Liberties. Put your maps aside for an evening and let me navigate you through the City of Brotherly Love, only this time you'll get to say "I lived" Philly rather than "I visited".
